text: |} The Down Royal Mares Novice Hurdle is a Grade 3 National Hunt hurdle race in Ireland which is open to mares aged four years or older. It is run at Down Royal over a distance of 2 miles (3,218 metres). The race is for novice hurdlers, and it is scheduled to take place each year in late October or early November.
